ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would definitely recommend this course to another student. Class time is productive and effective.
Yes I would recommend this course if they are interested in development.
Great way to learn about developmental biology. A great emphasis was placed upon experimental approaches, which I felt was very valuable.

A truly discussion-based survey course I would recommend for those interested in current questions in developmental biology. Would recommend having some previous exposure to developmental biology as the course (by necessity) goes through the different subjects kind of quickly.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I was given a great appreciation for different experiments. I thought that this class will be very helpful as i am moving forward in my career.

Before this course, I felt that I had at least a moderately good grasp of the historical advances made and approaches taken in devo bio, but not as much insight on the current "big questions" and the new approaches being taken to address them.
